item.description:
I love movies. You love movies. Let's go together! We'll try to make the movies we see diverse (mix comedy, romance, action, etc.) so that there will always be some members interested in each movie. (I hope!) Some movies may even be appropriate for kids. Guests are always welcome.

We'll meet at the Framingham theater (near the Natick Collection mall) and then go out for drinks/snacks somewhere nearby to discuss it. Occasionally we'll hit another theater with "offbeat" movies.

Join our group, answer our profile questions, take our polls, read our message boards, RSVP to our meetups! You can even get to know our other members and their favorite movies. Then come to our movie meetups and meet some of the nicest movie buffs in Metrowest!
item.name: The Framingham Movie Meetup
